POSTGRES_PASSWORD.short: Sets the password for the default user

POSTGRES_USER.short: The username for the default user. Defaults to `postgres`

POSTGRES_DB.short: The default database name. Defaults to the value of `POSTGRES_USER`

MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME.short: The username for the default superuser

MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD.short: The password for the default superuser
